page.title: 04BASIC STATISTICS <CONT.>
page.content: Many clubs/organisations were mentioned in the questionnaire returns.They can be seen as concerning Sport_45;Nature_25;Art/Music_5; Leisure_39;Charities_9;Church_18; Services/Defence_18;Others_16. We also asked questions concerning home_made produce.We received the following information: Grew vegetables_96;Made dairy products_10;Home_made drinks <wine,beer,cider>_29;Grew fruit_77; Made clothes_59;Kept bees_6; Made jam/marmalade_74. These last statistics reflect country life in the D_block. Church attendance returns show 13 families went very often<once a week>; 23 went often<once/twice a month>; 55 went rarely<festivals only>; and 21 families never attended church.
